message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you like to buy it from me for $14000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go that low. How about we compromise at $11000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to meet you at $9500. Can we make a deal at this price?
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10500?
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm willing to meet you at $10000. Can we make a deal at this price?
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to make one last offer. How about we meet at $10500, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?
